processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit, @unit varchar(32), @year int, @r int, @inputYearOpening bit, @inputCustomerBalance bit select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @unit = @@unit, @year = nam_bd from dmstt select @inputYearOpening = case when month(ngay_ky1) = month(ngay_dn2) and day(ngay_ky1) = day(ngay_dn2) then 0 else 1 end from dmstt select @inputCustomerBalance = case when val = 1 then 1 else 0 end from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_cn_dn'
if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'CustomerBalance', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
-- Checking &Checking; &EndErrorMode;
update @@table set du_co_nt00 = 0 where du_no_nt00 <> 0 update @@table set du_co00 = 0 where du_no00 <> 0
if @inputCustomerBalance = 0 begin update @@table set du_no1 = 0 update @@table set du_co1 = 0 update @@table set du_no_nt1 = 0 update @@table set du_co_nt1 = 0 end else begin if @inputYearOpening = 0 begin update @@table set du_no_nt1 = du_no_nt00 update @@table set du_co_nt1 = du_co_nt00 update @@table set du_no1 = du_no00 update @@table set du_co1 = du_co00 end else begin update @@table set du_co_nt1 = 0 where du_no_nt1 <> 0 update @@table set du_co1 = 0 where du_no1 <> 0 end end
if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from cdkh b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and b.nam = @year)
select distinct ma_dvcs, tk into #c from @@table select a.* into #k from @@table a join cdkh b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where b.nam = @year delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh)
&Inserting;
insert into cdtk(nam, ma_dvcs, tk, du_no00, du_co00, du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00, du_no1, du_co1, du_no_nt1, du_co_nt1, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select @year, ma_dvcs, tk, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, '1', getdate(), getdate(), @user, @user from #c a where not exists(select 1 from cdtk b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and b.nam = @year)
if @type = '1' begin select a.ma_kh, sum(a.du_no00 - a.du_co00) as du into #old from cdkh a join #k b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where a.nam = @year group by a.ma_kh
&Updating; where a.nam = @year
select a.ma_kh, sum(a.du_no00 - a.du_co00) as du into #new from cdkh a join #k b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where a.nam = @year group by a.ma_kh update dmkh set du13 = du13 + isnull(b.du, 0) - isnull(c.du, 0) from dmkh a join #new b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh join #old c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh end
select a.ma_dvcs, a.tk, sum(du_no00) as du_no00, sum(du_co00) as du_co00, sum(du_no_nt00) as du_no_nt00, sum(du_co_nt00) as du_co_nt00, sum(du_no1) as du_no1, sum(du_co1) as du_co1, sum(du_no_nt1) as du_no_nt1, sum(du_co_nt1) as du_co_nt1 into #cdkh from cdkh a join #c b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk where a.nam = @year group by a.ma_dvcs, a.tk
if @inputYearOpening = 0 update cdtk set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00, du_no1 = b.du_no00, du_co1 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt1 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt1 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join #cdkh b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk where a.nam = @year else begin if @inputCustomerBalance = 0 update cdtk set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join #cdkh b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk where a.nam = @year else update cdtk set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00, du_no1 = b.du_no1, du_co1 = b.du_co1, du_no_nt1 = b.du_no_nt1, du_co_nt1 = b.du_co_nt1 from cdtk a join #cdkh b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk where a.nam = @year end
update dmkh set du13 = du13 + isnull(b.du, 0) from dmkh a join (select ma_kh, sum(du_no00 - du_co00) as du from @@table group by ma_kh) b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
